title: Idea for new champ?
body: Maybe their should be a champ which can make his/her own weaponary using mana so he/she can be both ranged and melee depending what lane he/she goes( these could be his/her q and e). His/her's q could be that he/she does heaps of slashes (in melee form) and shoot something abit like ezreal (ranged). Finally this champ could have his/she's ult to either give him/her a completely new weapon or kinda like heimerdinger's ult can upgrade the weapon that is equiped. This champ would probably be based around basic attacks, so his/her biggest counters would be Quinn and Teemo. So in my opinion this would be a fun champ and could go top lane and ad carry
